question: 為替
sourceMnemonic: For the <kanji>sake</kanji> of <kanji>exchange</kanji>! What sounds so glorious is really just <vocabulary>currency exchange</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You need to do a bunch of <vocabulary>currency exchange</vocabulary> for your newest investment: <reading>ca</reading>r <reading>wa</reading>sh <reading>ce</reading>lery (かわせ)! Why of course, it's celery that's stored, cleaned, and… smoked inside of a car wash. So go get all the currency you have, we have some exchanging to do.
